title: Anoice Studio Albums [FLAC] {100.XY}
description:
Anoice Studio Albums


Wikipedia:
Anoice is a Tokyo based modern-classical/post-rock music group formed in 2004 by multi instrumentalists; Takahiro Kido, Yuki Murata, Utaka Fujiwara, Takahiro Matsue and Tadashi Yoshikawa.
Their debut album "Remmings" was released on Important Records, Boston in 2006, Their second album Ã¢â‚¬Å“Out of SeasonÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ and first EP Ã¢â‚¬Å“Ruined-Hotel SessionsÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ both recorded at the ruined hotel, were released on their own label, Ricco Label in Tokyo, 2008. Anoice then released their highly praised third album, "The Black Rain", on Ricco Label and Important Records in 2012.
The members of Anoice are also involved in some other projects such as;
Takahiro Kido; The guitarist/composer of Anoice.
Yuki Murata; The pianist/composer of Anoice.
RiLF; The post-rock band formed by the members of Anoice and Calu, who is the vocalist of Matryoshka.
films; The modern-classical/electronica music unit, featuring members of Anoice.
mokyow; The post-rock band formed by Takahiro Kido, Takahiro Matsue and Tadashi Yoshikawa.
cru; The modern-classical music unit formed by Takahiro Kido and Yuki Murata.
